text: Rodney Litchfield (1939 â€“ 5 September 2020) was an English actor. He was born in Wigan, Lancashire. His career began in 1983. He was known for his role was Wilfred Morton in the television series Coronation Street. He also played Tommy in Early Doors. He also appeared in shows like Juliet Bravo, A Touch of Frost, Cracker, Hetty Wainthropp Investigates, Heartbeat, and Peter Kay's Phoenix Nights. Litchfield died on 5 September 2020, aged 81.Early Doors actor Rodney Litchfield dies aged 81, show writer says ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Rodney Litchfield
